title: Ukraine war: The war is static, but ousting Russia is a seismic task
description: Six months on from the start of Russia's invasion, the threat will test Ukraine's spirit.

title: 'Too dehydrated to cry' - a lethal trek for migrants
description: Doctors treating migrants crossing the jungle in the Darien Gap describe their patients' desperation.

title: Aitch on his rise to fame: 'I've still got goals to achieve'
description: Manchester's poster boy looks back dizzying rise to fame, as he eyes his first ever number one album.

title: Dugong: Animal that inspired mermaid tales extinct in China
description: The dugong, a relative of the fabled manatee, has been declared functionally extinct in the region.

title: Inflation: Who is benefiting from soaring prices?
description: Many households are feeling the pinch of higher prices, but which sectors are benefiting from them?

title: The Scots Guards perform Eurovision 'Stefania' tribute for Ukraine's Independence Day
description: The band play the Kalush Orchestra's Stefania - the 2022 winning song - on behalf of the UK Armed Forces.

title: The Ghost Runner: John Tarrant's story of triumph and tragedy
description: One of Britain's best athletes of the 1950s and '60s was held back by rules of the day - but nobody would stop the 'Ghost Runner'.

title: CEO Secrets: Mopping the floor and a lesson in feedback
description: Steve Vamos of accounting software firm Xero shares his business advice for the CEO Secrets series.

title: Formula 1: What should you look out for as F1 returns after its summer break?
description: Can Max Verstappen be stopped? Will a rule change help Mercedes? Andrew Benson picks out the key themes as Formula 1 returns.

title: Dinosaur tracks from 113m years ago exposed by severe drought
description: Around 60 tracks from the predator Acrocanthosaurus have been revealed for the first time in 22 years.

title: The Hundred: Moeen six leads to brilliant crowd catch
description: Moeen Ali's huge six goes for a brilliant crowd catch during The Hundred match between Oval Invincibles and Birmingham Phoenix at The Oval.

title: Ukraine round-up: UN warns against trial of POWs and the return of top-flight football
description: The UN human rights office warns that Ukrainian POWs being put on trial could constitute a war crime.

title: Stolen car found stuck in metro station in Madrid
description: A man is arrested after a vehicle is pulled up a staircase by firefighters in Plaza Eliptica station.

title: Whipsnade Zoo residents hop on the scales for annual weigh-in
description: The Bedfordshire zoo says it uses "creative tactics" to entice its 10,000 residents to get measured.

title: Girl, 9, shot dead after gun chase spills into home
description: Olivia Pratt-Korbel was shot in the chest and her mother shot in the hand at their home in Liverpool.

title: Darya Dugina: Moscow murder accusation is fiction, says Ukraine
description: Darya Dugina, a Russian nationalist commentator, was the daughter of an ally to President Putin.

title: Energy bills: Half of UK households face fuel poverty, EDF warns
description: People are in for a "catastrophic winter" unless the government does more to help, says EDF.

title: Dogs can cry when owners come home, study suggests
description: Ecstatic canines can well up when they are reunited with their human companions, a study suggests.

title: Alfredo Morelos: Rangers striker left in Scotland for PSV tie because of fitness and attitude
description: Alfredo Morelos is omitted from Rangers' squad for the crucial Champions League play-off second leg against PSV Eindhoven.

title: Gatwick flights cancelled at short notice due to staff sickness
description: Around 26 EasyJet flights have been cancelled in and out of the London airport.

title: Channel migrants: Almost 1,300 migrants cross Channel in new record
description: So far this month 6,168 people have made the crossing in small boats, compared to 3,683 in July.

title: Monkeypox antiviral drug put to the test in trial
description: Researchers hope the drug - tecovirimat - can help accelerate patient recovery from the virus.

title: Fetty Wap: Rapper faces jail time after admitting drugs charge
description: The Trap Queen rapper admits to being part of a US-based ring that trafficked drugs between states.

title: Najib Razak: Malaysia's ex-PM starts jail term after final appeal fails
description: Najib Razak denies charges of appropriating millions of dollars from a state-owned wealth fund.

title: Owami Davies: What we know about her disappearance
description: The student nurse was last seen nearly 30 miles from her home more than six weeks ago.

title: Not so Despicable: China changes ending of Minions movie
description: The movie is meant to be the backstory of a villain but China's latest alteration has changed this.

title: US Open 2022: Will Novak Djokovic be able to play?
description: Former world number one Novak Djokovic has his "fingers crossed" he is allowed to play in the US Open despite not being vaccinated against Covid-19.

title: Ben Stokes: England Test captain feared he might never play again during mental health struggles
description: England Test captain Ben Stokes says he feared he might not play again during his mental health break from the sport.

title: 'We get groped on nights out all the time'
description: The BBC joins a police patrol seeking to crackdown on sexual offences.

title: James Webb: Space telescope reveals 'incredible' Jupiter views
description: The James Webb Space Telescope shows the planet's auroras and storms in unprecedented detail.

title: 377A: Gay marriage looms as new frontline in Singapore battle for LGBT rights
description: Joy over the historic decision turns to anxiety as a new frontline looms in the fight for LGBT rights.

title: David Fudge: What went wrong with the police investigation?
description: The wife of a motorcyclist gets justice after funding her own investigation into her husband's death.

title: Port of Felixstowe strike: 'This pay rise makes a big difference'
description: As industrial action enters a third day, why are union members at the UK's busiest port walking out?

title: Why is raw sewage pumped into the sea?
description: Water companies have been releasing raw sewage at popular British seaside resorts.

title: Artemis Mission: A guide to Nasa's mega Moon rocket
description: The US space agency is getting ready to go back to the Moon with the test flight of it’s most powerful ever rocket.
